mutants.original_line: s1 = ''.join(ch.lower() for ch in s1 if ch.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: s1 = 'MUTATED'.join((ch.lower() for ch in s1 if ch.isalpha()))

mutants.original_line: s2 = ''.join(ch.lower() for ch in s2 if ch.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((ch.lower() for ch in s2 if ch.isalpha()))
